alert.note: Alert for Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 25 at 11:30PM CDT until May 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River near Ripley affecting Payne County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cimarron River near Ripley. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Places along the Cimarron River valley in Payne County are briefly flooded. Agricultural lands and oil wells located near the channel are isolated by water in cutoff channels along the river valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The Cimarron River is expected to fall to 7.5 feet Monday evening. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
